Then Ghost Rider comes to regain vengence on the those men and the beast and then they all fall of the building. So Ghost Rider slams his motorcycle into the car while jumping in the air to avoid the blast the car blows up and the beast is down and out. Then it shows a bunch of people in heaven. Then a bunch of people knocking on doors and talking on a phone. Then one of the girls oes to bed and has a dream about people talking to her in heaven.
